Issue.creator: pankajcheema
Issue.summary: Using Dev Mode Not working in 1.4.2
Issue.description: PANI 006 Failed validating bootstrap block: initializing channelconfig failed: could not create channel Orderer sub-group config: Orderer Org SampleOrg cannot contain endpoints value until V2_0+ capabilities have been enabled panic: Failed validating bootstrap block: initializing channelconfig failed: could not create channel Orderer sub-group config: Orderer Org SampleOrg cannot contain endpoints value until V2_0+ capabilities have been enabled{code} when running the command {code:java} ORDERER_GENERAL_GENESISPROFILE=SampleDevModeSolo orderer{code} >
